content: For the last few minutes, every time I click on the source link (for e.g. on the complex numbers page), I get this webpage : https://example.com/#L36-L36
I tried this across a few different pages inside the docs. Same behaviour.
I think @Henrik Böving knows about this issue and is working on it (here's a comment, along with the few preceding ones).
Yes there is in fact already a working fix, its just that the CI in mathlib hasn't run yet because it is stateful ans we forgot to clean up some state
Henrik Böving has marked this topic as resolved.
